ingredients.ingredient: ⅓ cup Progresso® Italian style panko crispy bread crumbs
4 each boneless skinless chicken breasts, flattened slightly
1 (18 ounce) can Progresso™ Recipe Starters™ fire roasted tomato cooking sauce

cookingTips: Pound chicken breasts evenly to ensure uniform thickness and even cooking
Coat chicken in panko and Parmesan mixture before pan-frying for crispy texture
Top with mozzarella and sauce in the skillet, then cover to melt cheese efficiently
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This weeknight version uses pre-made sauce and panko coating. How does flattening chicken breasts improve cooking consistency?
